p: Bromhexine hydrochloride (BHH) is a drug used as a mucolytic and cough suppressant that shows specific inhibition of TMPRSS2 (IC 50 = 0.75 μM). Given that BHH is an FDA-approved drug with no significant adverse effects, it could be used for treatment of coronavirus infections as an inhibitor of TMPRSS2 [64], [66], [92].
